rules.summary: rs601338 in FUT2 has been associated with differences in circulating vitamin B12 levels in population studies.

default_summary: No call or unrecognized genotype for rs601338.
suggestion: B12 status depends on diet and absorption. Consider discussing testing with a clinician if you have concerns. This is not medical advice.

evidence_level.summary: Associations exist but effects are modest and influenced by diet and health context.

limitations: This does not measure vitamin B12 status. Diet, medications, and gut health are major factors.
references: FUT2 rs601338 and vitamin B12 GWAS studies (PubMed)
